item.title: Accessing a self-hosted website from the local network (hairpin)
item.description: Explanation: In this case we are trying to redirect a website request, to a machine in the local [[3-sysnet/2-network/Network - MoC]] which hosts the website over the local network accesible through its domain name.

item.title: Preserve Bash History from Multiple Terminal Windows (Linux)
item.description: “In this tutorial, we studied ways to preserve Bash history in multiple terminal windows on [[3-sysnet/1-linux/Linux - MoC|Linux - MoC]] .
